com.xamoom.android.xamoomsdk

Class EnduserApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xamoom.android.xamoomsdk.EnduserApi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class EnduserApi
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    EnduserApi is the main part of the XamoomSDK. You can use it to send api request to the xamoom cloud. Use EnduserApi(String, Context) to initialize. Change the requested language by setting language. The users language is saved in systemLanguage. Get local saved data by setting setOffline(boolean) to true. Data must be saved using OfflineStorageManager.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

      • getSharedInstance

        public static EnduserApi getSharedInstance(@NonNull
                                           java.lang.String apikey,
                                           android.content.Context context)
        Use this to get your instance. It will create a new one with your api key, when there is no isntance.
        Parameters:
        apikey - Your xamoom api key.
        Returns:
        EnduserApi instance.

        Returns:
